instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Sekitar tengah hari, polisi di tempat kejadian memasuki bagian dari pipa, hanya muncul beberapa menit yang lalu tanpa pengunjuk rasa.
output: At around noon, police on scene entered the section of pipe, only to emerge a few minutes later without the protesters.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Sisa-sisa pesawat, yang terkonsentrasi di 600 meter dengan 200 meter daerah (1.968 kaki dengan 656 kaki), tampaknya relatif utuh yang mengarahkan peneliti untuk percaya bahwa pesawat menghantam air utuh dan tidak meledak udara.
output: The remains of the plane, which were concentrated in a 600 metres by 200 metres (1,968 feet by 656 feet) area, appear to be relatively intact which leads investigators to believe that the plane hit the water intact and did not explode mid-air.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Keamanan di Copenhagen, ibukota Denmark, diperketat setelah serangan di London pada hari Kamis yang menyebabkan 49 orang terbunuh.
output: Security in Copenhagen, the capital of Denmark, was tightened after the attacks on London Thursday when 49 people were killed.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Kyle Busch, karena kecelakaannya dengan Jeff Burton tetap menguasai posisi ketiga sedangkan rekan satu timnya Hamlin di posisi keempat.
output: Kyle Busch, because of his accident with Jeff Burton maintained the third position while his team mate Hamlin is fourth.

instruction: In this task, you will be given a sentence in the Indonesian language(Bahasa variant). Your job is to convert it into the English language.
input: Pembajak mengatakan bahwa jika tuntutan mereka tidak dipenuhi, dia akan meledakkan pesawat.
output: The hijacker said that if his demand was not met, he would blow up the plane.
